name: Tappu Sushi - Group 8
description:
Tappu Sushi is a game where the players aim is to grab more food from the conveyor belt that the opposing player.

Group 8:

Charlie Kinglake - Group Manager, Designer and Programmer

Michael Davis - Programmer

Andreea Mazarianu - Designer

George Smuts - Designer

How to play:

Players must send food along the conveyor belt by either clicking or tapping on the send food bell.

Once food has been sent, the opposing player must click the naruto to grab the food as it goes over the center boundary.

The closer food is to the center of the boundary, the higher the score they will recieve.

Players will recieve:

- Perfect = 5 points

- Excellent = 3 points

- Good = 1 point

There are an equal amount of moves, giving each player an equal opportunity.

ESC to close the application(if run on Windows).

The uploaded files include:

- Windows build (single-player only due to using mouse only for tap function)

- Android APK (Tested on Android 7.0)
